message: Let's get this started! I'll give you a fair share, and we can work together from here.
I'll give you a decent share, let's see if you'll accept this one!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more for my efforts. Let's meet in the middle!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give away too much!
I'm getting desperate, but I'll give you a decent chunk. Don't expect more!
I'm not going to give in yet, but I'll give you a slightly better deal. You're getting desperate, aren't you?
I'm running out of time, but I'll give you a small consolation prize. Don't expect me to go any lower!
You're really desperate now, aren't you? I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting off that easy!
This is my last offer. I'll give you a tiny share, but I need to get out of this game with something.
You're really scraping the bottom of the barrel now. I'll give you a tiny share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
This is my final offer. I'll give you a token amount, but I need to walk away with most of the money.
I'm not going to give in. You can have it all, but I'm not going to accept a token amount. I'd rather get nothing than give in to your demands.
